import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; import {removeUserById, addUser} from './API' export const UserList = (props) => { const [userList, setUserList] = useState([]) const [addUser, setAddUser] = useState('') useEffect(() => { props.getUsers() .then((state) => state.filter(people => people.active)) .then(people => setUserList(people)); }, []) function submitHandler(userList, setUserList) { } return
{userList?.length ? userList.map((el) => <>) : 'Пользователей нет ....'}
